referenceObject.reference: Pickard-Cambridge, O. (1877b). On some new species of Araneidea, with characters of two new genera and some remarks on the families Podophthalmides and Dinopides. Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London 45(3): 557-578, pl. 56-57.
